.TH GIT-REBASE 1 "2026-02-13" "Git" "Git Manual"
.SH NAME
git-rebase \- Reapply commits on top of another base tip
.SH SYNOPSIS
.B git rebase
.RI [ --onto= NEWBASE ]
.RI [ UPSTREAM ]
.SH OPTIONS
.TP
.B --continue
Continue the rebase operation.
.TP
.B --abort
Abort the rebase operation.
.TP
.BI --onto= NEWBASE
Use NEWBASE as the target base.
.SH COMMANDS
.TP
.B continue
Continue a stopped rebase.
.TP
.B abort
Abort a stopped rebase.
